name: Fuzz Force: Spook Squad Demo
description:
Grab your Dice and let's hunt some Ghosts!

Take on Ghosts in this deck building roguelite with Dice.  Choose your path through the Forest to find new Dice and ability Modules or encounter random events. Prepare wisely and take on the Forest Boss who guards the path to the Tower.

When you're done, follow this link to sign up and give feedback. Those who do will get some goodies in the full game and can be involved in shaping how it turns out!
